Name: Nigeria
Description: Most populous country in Africa, known for its rich culture and natural resources.

Name: Ethiopia
Description: A landlocked country in the Horn of Africa, known for its ancient history and diverse culture.

Name: Egypt
Description: Known for its ancient civilization, pyramids, and historical monuments.

Name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
Description: Central African country with vast mineral resources and rich biodiversity.

Name: Tanzania
Description: Known for its wildlife, including the Serengeti and Mount Kilimanjaro.

Name: South Africa
Description: Southernmost country in Africa, known for its diversity, natural beauty, and history.

Name: Kenya
Description: East African country known for its wildlife, safari tourism, and diverse culture.

Name: Uganda
Description: Landlocked country known for its lakes and mountains.

Name: Sudan
Description: Country in northeastern Africa, known for its history and archaeological sites.

Name: Algeria
Description: Largest country in Africa, known for its deserts and ancient history.

Name: Morocco
Description: Located in North Africa, known for its history, architecture, and cuisine.

Name: Angola
Description: Country in southern Africa, known for its oil resources and natural beauty.

Name: Mozambique
Description: Southeast African country with a long coastline, known for its beaches and wildlife.

Name: Ghana
Description: West African country known for its historical significance and natural resources.

Name: Madagascar
Description: Island nation off the southeast coast of Africa, known for its biodiversity and unique wildlife.

Name: Cameroon
Description: Central African country with a diverse range of cultures, landscapes, and wildlife.

Name: Côte d'Ivoire
Description: West African country known for its diverse culture, beaches, and cocoa production.

Name: Somalia
Description: Horn of Africa country known for its long coastline, ancient history, and strategic position.

Name: Zimbabwe
Description: Landlocked country in southern Africa, known for its natural resources and cultural heritage.
